home.text_base_description: Prestigious Hollywood Hills Laurel Canyon California Properties. Location is suitable for a architecturally significant project. Nearby multi-million dollar estates with recent sales. Two parcels being sold together. Parcel #1, APN 5567-031-004 is 10,296 sq. ft. fronts Laurel Canyon Blvd. (with a Laurel Canyon Blvd. Address). Parcel #2, APN 5567-031-027 is 6,516 sq. ft. adjacent to the above property (Merrywood Dr. Address). These Laurel Canyon view side by side lots comprise a total of 16,812 sq. ft. bounded on the west by Merrywood Drive (down slope), and on the east side Laurel Canyon Blvd (up slope). Foundations and retain walls remain of two single family residences, potential to build two residences, or property tie both lots for estate size residence. These properties are within yards of the iconic Houdini Mansion and Frank Zappa's Tree House/Log Cabin at Lookout Mountain Ave. & Laurel Canyon Blvd. intersection. During the 1960's, Jim Morrison, Mama Cass and other notable musicians lived in this area. Central location for Hollywood, West Hollywood, Los Angles, Studio City and the San Fernando Valley access.

home_facts.Community: C03 - Sunset Strip - Hollywood Hills West
